entry.RedBlue: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.
entry.Yellow: Always tormented by headaches. It uses psychic powers, but it is not known if it intends to do so.
entry.Gold: It has mystical powers but doesn't recall that it has used them. That is why it always looks puzzled.
entry.Silver: If its chronic headache peaks, it may exhibit odd powers. It seems unable to recall such an episode.
entry.Crystal: The only time it can use its psychic power is when its sleeping brain cells happen to wake.
entry.Ruby: PSYDUCK uses a mysterious power. When it does so, this POKéMON generates brain waves that are supposedly only seen in sleepers. This discovery spurred controversy among scholars.
entry.Sapphire: If it uses its mysterious power, PSYDUCK can’t remember having done so. It apparently can’t form a memory of such an event because it goes into an altered state that is much like deep sleep.
entry.FireRed: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.
entry.LeafGreen: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.
entry.Emerald: When its headache intensifies, it starts using strange powers. However, it has no recollection of its powers, so it always looks befuddled and bewildered.
entry.Diamond: If its usual headache worsens, it starts exhibiting odd powers. It can’t remember doing so, however.
entry.Pearl: It never remembers using its odd powers, so it always tilts its head in puzzlement.
entry.Platinum: Overwhelmed by enigmatic abilities, it suffers a constant headache. It sometimes uses mysterious powers.
entry.HeartGold: It has mystical powers but doesn’t recall that it has used them. That is why it always looks puzzled.
entry.SoulSilver: If its chronic headache peaks, it may exhibit odd powers. It seems unable to recall such an episode.
entry.BlackWhite: Overwhelmed by enigmatic abilities, it suffers a constant headache. It sometimes uses mysterious powers.
entry.Black 2White 2: When headaches stimulate its brain cells, which are usually inactive, it can use a mysterious power.
entry.X: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.
entry.Y: It has mystical powers but doesn’t recall that it has used them. That is why it always looks puzzled.
entry.Omega Ruby: Psyduck uses a mysterious power. When it does so, this Pokémon generates brain waves that are supposedly only seen in sleepers. This discovery spurred controversy among scholars.
entry.Alpha Sapphire: If it uses its mysterious power, Psyduck can’t remember having done so. It apparently can’t form a memory of such an event because it goes into an altered state that is much like deep sleep.
entry.Sun: As a result of headaches so fierce they cause it to cry, it sometimes uses psychokinesis without meaning to.
entry.Moon: This Pokémon is troubled by constant headaches. The more pain it’s in, the more powerful its psychokinesis becomes.
